items.summary: Identify and fix the root cause of the deployment/build failure reported as a “System configuration error” by validating the project’s build inputs (frontend static asset references + backend canister compilation) and making any necessary code/config adjustments so the app builds and deploys successfully.

Ensure all files referenced by PWA configuration are present and correctly located under frontend/public (manifest + index.html), specifically all icon files referenced by frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest and frontend/index.html.

Harden the service worker cache list in frontend/public/sw.js to avoid caching non-deployable source paths (e.g., /src/*.tsx) and ensure offline fallback behavior does not cause build/deploy issues when assets are missing or paths differ between dev and production builds.
